mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{originName}, #{changeName})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND BOARD_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND BOARD_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'
